data.name: Donut Distraction
data.detailed_description:
Ever wanted to be an Elephant and catch donuts on your trunk?? Of course you have and now YOU CAN!!

Donut Distraction is the crazy fun game for all ages that puts you in the shoes of an Elephant with a wildly fun trunk and a variety of crazy Donut games to play!! Coming soon is multiplayer and a makeup tent to customise your Elephant with Hats, Glasses, Hair and more!

Donut Dash
- Catch as many Donuts as you can before the timer runs out! Collect all Donuts with the DYNAMITE donut
- Look out for the GOLDEN Donut to double your score and avoid the DODGY Donut that reduces your score!

Donut Dodge
- Don't let the Donuts touch your trunk or it's game over!
- Beware of the instant Death Donut!

Donut Destroy
- The clock is ticking... how many donuts can you destroy in 1 minute? Double points for using the TRUNK!
- How many Donuts can you catch before you miss one....

data.short_description: Ever wanted to be an Elephant and catch, dodge and destroy donuts with your trunk?? NOW YOU CAN!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
